title: How This Gambling Recovery Channel is Helping Thousands Every Month
description: From gambling addict to full time recovery content creator. Learn how ODAAT Gambling Awareness grew to help thousands every month.

portfolio.alt: How I Got 10,000 People To Quit Gambling

content.content: In a digital world flooded with get-rich-quick schemes, gambling ads, and influencer-led betting promotions, ODAAT Gambling Awareness stands out by doing the opposite, telling the truth.

At Cartori Media, we've had the privilege of working with Rob to help shape this channel's growth - and what it represents is bigger than just views. It's about building a platform that reaches people at their lowest, and helps them take the first step toward change.
What is ODAAT Gambling Awareness?

Founded by Rob Minnick, a person in long-term recovery himself, the channel is building a loyal audience by providing something rare on YouTube: honest, relatable, and hopeful conversations about gambling addiction. ODAAT stands for "One Day at a Time", which reflects the mindset Rob embraces and encourages for anyone battling compulsive gambling.

Through solo videos, honest reflections, and powerful interviews, Rob shares his personal experience and highlights the voices of others who have walked the same path. He also creates content to help people overcome their own addictions by sharing what worked for him and breaking the stigma around seeking help.
Results So Far
By having a consistent upload schedule, listening to his audience, and producing content that provides value to viewers ODAAT Gambling Awareness has:

content: Ranked for high-value gambling recovery search terms

content.content: The growth is real, and this is just the beginning.
What Makes ODAAT Different?
While many recovery channels focus on broad addiction topics, ODAAT Gambling Awareness is focused on a single issue: problem gambling
Niching down allows the channel to:

content: Speak directly to people trapped in betting cycles
Share real-life recovery stories without filters
Provide quality advice to help with their specific addiction

content.content: The tone is personal. The content is vulnerable. And the advice is life changing. By niching down, Rob has been able to grow an audience without watering down the message. Instead of chasing viral trends, Rob built an audience that genuinely trust and values him. Nothing flashy, just consistent growth.
Using Data To Drive Growth

YouTube has one of the most advanced data-analytics available of any social media platform. By leveraging YouTube's analytics, Rob has made small changes that, compounded over time, create major momentum.

By reviewing retention graphs, search traffic, viewer engagement, and more - Rob has been able to refine his approach. Reworking the title or adjusting a hook in the first 30 seconds, leads to gradual changes that lead to long term growth.

Want To Use Data Like ODAAT Gambling Awareness? Here are a few key metrics to look for: Click-Through-Rate(CTR): How often are people clicking on your video. Higher CTR means your title and thumbnail captured their interest. Average Percent Viewed(APV): How much of your video are people watching. Higher APV means people stayed engaged with your content. Impressions: How often is your video being shown to potential viewers. Higher Impressions means YouTube thinks lots of people will find it valuable.
Higher Quality & Higher Output

Rob has strategically used thumbnails, video editing, and YouTube's Shorts feature as a way to stand out. This has undoubtably played a major role in the success of his YouTube channel. By using high quality thumbnails, Rob is able to grab the attention of potential viewers. And when combined with editing meant to keep the viewer engaged, this sets him up for videos that draw the viewer in, but most importantly, keep them interested.

Another way Rob has increased his viewership, is by repurposing content. By making short form videos out of his longer pieces of content, he is able to increase his content output, as well as use the short form videos as "trailer" for his longer videos.
Building Organic Growth Through Authenticity
Rob's content isn't built for algorithms. It's built for people. But ironically, that's also what's helping the channel grow.

His videos foster trust, leading to longer watch times and stronger engagement, two factors YouTube rewards. Viewers come for a single story, then often stay to get help. This is a calculated model that ODAAT uses, by hooking a viewer with an enticing story, he can lead many of them to watch his content on how to quit. This leads to a significantly higher conversion rate than if he only posted videos like "How to Quit Gambling".
The Road Ahead

ODAAT Gambling Awareness has all the fundamentals of a long-lasting, high-impact channel. It's purpose-driven. It's community-focused. And with continued strategic support, it's positioned to grow into one of the most trusted voices in the gambling recovery space.
This is the kind of content that YouTube needs more of.
